changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "cluster_agent_enrollment" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "token" CHAR(32) NOT NULL, "expires_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL, "used" BOOLEAN NOT NULL, "cluster_id" UUID NOT NULL, "creator_account_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("cluster_id") REFERENCES "cluster" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("creator_account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("token") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_cluster_agent_enrollment_cluster_id" ON "cluster_agent_enrollment" ("cluster_id");
